message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.PL, cs.SE 

The paper discusses a new single sign-on system that is privacy-respecting and secure. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with authentication and privacy. The paper also mentions that the system is based on standard HTML5 and web features, which suggests that it may fall under the category of web science (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses formal analysis of the system, which could fall under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY). The system is also platform independent, which could suggest the category of programming languages (cs.PL). Finally, the paper discusses the non-trivial design of secure SSO systems, which could fall under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
